title: Amazon Fire 7 Tablet Review: The Best Budget Tablet of 2017?
description:
Amazon Fire 7 Tablet - This is a great little device for the price, it may have a few flaws but at just $50/£50 it has to be one of the best budget tablets on the market!

Amazon Fire 7:
US - https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00TSUGXKE/
UK - https://www.amazon.co.uk/Fire-Tablet-Display-Wi-Fi-Black/dp/B00Y3TM6CO/

Music Sample:
Newton Faulkner - Dream Catch Me

Background Music: 
Shawn O - These Three Words
https://soundcloud.com/dj-shawn-o

Business inquiries: hi@jamestalkstech.com
